name: Gangplank
title: the Saltwater Scourge
i_displayname: Trial by Fire / Trial by Fire 2

i.name: Trial by Fire
i.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

q.name: Parrrley
q.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

w.name: Remove Scurvy
w.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

e.name: Powder Keg
e.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

r.name: Cannon Barrage
r.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

riot.name: Trial by Fire
riot.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

i1.name: Trial by Fire
i1.blurb: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Gangplank's''' next [[basic attack]] burns the target, dealing {{pp|55 to 225|color=true damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds, with each tick occurring every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. Turrets receive 50% reduced damage.
i1.description2: If '''Gangplank''' successfully hits a target with ''Trial by Fire'', he {{ai|Trial by Fire 2|Gangplank|gains}} {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. Destroying a {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} instantly readies ''Trial by Fire'' and grants its {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
i1.description3: ''Trial by Fire'' cannot be applied with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} or {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}.

riot.name: Trial by Fire
riot.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

i2.name: Trial by Fire
i2.blurb: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
i2.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Gangplank's''' next [[basic attack]] burns the target, dealing {{pp|55 to 225|color=true damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds, with each tick occurring every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. Turrets receive 50% reduced damage.
i2.description2: If '''Gangplank''' successfully hits a target with ''Trial by Fire'', he {{ai|Trial by Fire 2|Gangplank|gains}} {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. Destroying a {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} instantly readies ''Trial by Fire'' and grants its {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
i2.description3: ''Trial by Fire'' cannot be applied with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} or {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}.

riot.name: Parrrley
riot.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
riot.tooltip:
Fires a bullet that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects).

If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders {{ e2 }} bonus Gold and {{ e5 }} Silver Serpents. (Trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).

q1.name: Parrrley
q1.blurb: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and applying [[on-hit effects]].
q1.description2: ''Parrrley'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
q1.description3: If ''Parrrley'' kills its target, '''Gangplank''' plunders {{gold|gold}} and {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}}, the latter of which can be spent to upgrade {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}}.
q1.leveling3: {{st|Gold Plunder|{{g|{{ap|3 to 7}}}}|Silver Serpent Plunder|{{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank|icononly=yes}} {{ap|4 to 8}}}}
notes: * {{tip|On-hit}} effects that deal area of effect damage will allow ''Parrrley'' to plunder from every enemy killed. This includes enemies killed by '''Gangplank's''' {{ais|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} when activated by ''Parrrley''.
* ''Parrrley'' doesn't count as a basic attack for {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.

riot.name: Remove Scurvy
riot.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
riot.tooltip: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, curing all disabling effects and healing him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of his missing Health.

w1.name: Remove Scurvy
w1.blurb: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, removing all [[crowd control]] affecting him and {{tip|heal|healing}} himself.
notes: * ''Remove Scurvy'' only removes crowd control debuffs, so it cannot remove:
*** Yet it is one of the few abilities that can remove {{tip|suppression}}.
**** {{ai|Nether Grasp|Malzahar}} and {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} will still damage '''Gangplank''' even if he moves away.

riot.name: Powder Keg
riot.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
riot.tooltip:
Places a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank or his enemies at a location for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If Gangplank destroys a keg, it explodes dealing the attack's damage as physical damage (ignores {{ e0 }}% Armor) to enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Champions take {{ e3 }} bonus physical damage from the explosion.

When a keg explodes, other kegs with overlapping blast zones chain explode (damage does not stack).

Kegs health decays every {{ f5 }} seconds. (Decay rate increases at level 7 and 13)

Keg explosions apply Parrrley's plunder effect.

e1.name: Powder Keg
e1.blurb: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Gangplank''' stores a charge of ''Powder Keg'' periodically, up to a maximum of 3 stored at once.
e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' places a ''Powder Keg'' at the target location for 25 seconds, which connects to other nearby ''Powder Kegs''.
e1.description3: '''Gangplank''' and his enemies can attack the ''Powder Keg'' with their basic attacks, dealing 1 damage per hit. '''Gangplank''' may also shoot the barrel with ''Parrrley''. If '''Gangplank''' scores the killing blow, it explodes, also triggering a chain reaction that explodes nearby connected ''kegs''. If killed by an enemy, the ''keg'' is safely dismantled.
e1.description4: An exploding ''keg'' deals the {{as|attack's damage}} to all nearby enemies, plus {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} against champions, ignoring {{as|40% of their armor}}, as well as {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once.
notes: * An exploding ''Powder Keg'' will splash {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} bonus damage, and will also be modified if the attack critically strikes.

* An exploding ''Powder Keg's'' damage is not increased by most [[attack effects]] from runes or items, such as {{ii|Blade of the Ruined King}} or {{ii|Wit's End}}. There is a notable exception, however: the bonus damage from {{ii|Sheen}} (and its upgrades) will be splashed to all targets.
* The ''Powder Keg'' is classified as being hit for the purposes of triggering effects such as {{ii|Tiamat}} with the effects centered on the keg.
* As of [[V7.22]], enemies hit by ''Powder Keg's'' damage will be subject to [[ability effects]].

riot.name: Cannon Barrage
riot.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Signals Gangplank's ship to fire {{ f3 }} waves of cannonballs at an area over {{ e3 }} seconds. Each wave deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Collect Silver Serpents with Parrrley to upgrade in the shop.

r1.name: Cannon Barrage
r1.blurb: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' signals his ship off-shore to fire upon the target area for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and {{tip|sight|revealing}} it for the duration. Each wave deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
r1.description2: '''Gangplank''' can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}} each, which improve ''Cannon Barrage'':
r1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage Per Wave|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Cluster|{{ap|40*3 to 100*3}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
r1.description3: {{sbc|{{ii|Death's Daughter}}:}} An initial cannonball lands in the center of the barrage, dealing a cluster's worth of {{as|true damage}} to all enemies it hits and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
r1.description4: {{sbc|{{ii|Raise Morale}}:}} The barrage grants allies {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while they are inside the area, persisting for 2 seconds after leaving it.
r1.description5: {{sbc|{{ii|Fire at Will}}:}} ''Cannon Barrage'' fires{{ft|6 additional waves|2 additional clusters}} over its duration.
r1.leveling3:
{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*12 to 100*12}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage with
''Fire at Will''|{{ap|40*18 to 100*18}} {{as|(+ 180% AP)}}|Maximum Mixed Total Damage with
''Fire at Will'' and ''Death's Daughter''|{{ap|40*21 to 100*21}} {{as|(+ 210% AP)}}}}
notes: * ''Cannon Barrage's'' slow lingers for 0.25 seconds after affected enemies leave the target area.
